node.statement: Core connectivity: The Core = {1,2,3,4,5,6} forms a connected subgraph of Î“. From g_1: edges {1,6}, {6,4}, {4,3}. From g_2: edges {1,2}, {2,4}, {4,5}. From g_3: edges {5,6}, {6,2}, {2,3}. Starting from vertex 1, we can reach: 6 via {1,6}; 4 via {6,4}; 3 via {4,3}; 2 via {1,2}; 5 via {4,5}. Thus all six Core vertices are connected.
